6    */
7   package org.hibernate.cache.spi.support;
8   
9   import org.hibernate.engine.spi.SharedSessionContractImplementor;
10  
11  /**
12   * A general read/write abstraction over the specific "cache"
13   * object from the caching provider.
14   *
15   * @apiNote Similar to {@link org.hibernate.cache.spi.access.CachedDomainDataAccess},
16   * some methods represent "transactional" (access to Session) and some are non-"transactional"
17   *
18   * @author Steve Ebersole
19   */
20  public interface StorageAccess {
21  	/**
22  	 * Get an item from the cache.
23  	 */
24  	Object getFromCache(Object key, SharedSessionContractImplementor session);
25  
26  	/**
27  	 * Put an item into the cache
28  	 */
29  	void putIntoCache(Object key, Object value, SharedSessionContractImplementor session);
30  
31  	/**
32  	 * Remove an item from the cache by key
33  	 */
34  	default void removeFromCache(Object key, SharedSessionContractImplementor session) {
35  		evictData( key );
36  	}
37  
38  	/**
39  	 * Clear data from the cache
40  	 */
41  	default void clearCache(SharedSessionContractImplementor session) {
42  		evictData();
43  	}
44  
45  	/**
46  	 * Does the cache contain this key?
47  	 */
48  	boolean contains(Object key);
49  
50  	/**
51  	 * Clear all data regardless of transaction/locking
52  	 */
53  	void evictData();
54  
55  	/**
56  	 * Remove the entry regardless of transaction/locking
57  	 */
58  	void evictData(Object key);
59  
60  	/**
61  	 * Release any resources.  Called during cache shutdown
62  	 */
63  	void release();
64  }
